研究阐明了小鼠学习过程中脑活动的启示通过第一次揭示动物犯错时在大脑中发生的事情，约翰·霍普金斯大学的研究人员正在阐明神经科学的圣杯：我们学习方式的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-sheds-light-on-on-brain-ach-activity-derivity-dring-learning-in-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-sheds-light-on-on-brain-ach-activity-derivity-derivity-derivity-nearning-in-rearning-in-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28De75E2-7233-4186-87A2-D88C957579BA Wed, 19 Mar 2025 14:21:49 -0400 Study sheds light on brain activity during learning in mice
男性性行为期间的大脑动态揭示了为了发现动物中性行为的是什么，研究人员研究了雄性小鼠的大脑活动，这在涉及射精的性行为的一系列动作中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/brain-dynamics-durnamics-durning-male-sexual-sexual-behavior-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/brain-dynamics-durnamics-durning-male-sexual-sexual-behavior-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b24f26c8-bedc-43d9-be1b-e06f06f0daf1d00 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 14:18:00 -0400 Brain dynamics during male sexual behavior revealed
突破性研究揭示了DNA的力学科学家第一次见证了DNA开始瓦解的那一刻，揭示了DNA是代码一生的分子的必要分子事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/breakthrough-study-unveils-mechanics-of-dna-unwinding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/breakthrough-study-unveils-mechanics-of-dna-unwinding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92487179-D98A-476F-B4D6-1AC6BADDC408 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 14:08:32 -0400 Breakthrough study unveils mechanics of DNA unwinding
科学家发现了潜在的胃癌新原因的暗示科学家首次系统地分析了胃内膜组织中的体细胞突变，以取消突变过程，其中一些过程可能导致癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/scientists-uncover-hints-of-a-a-a-potential-new-cause-new-cause-of-stomach-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/scientists-uncover-hints-of-a-a-a-potential-new-cause-new-cause-of-stomach-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26C4A0EF-C1B6-4F47-92FF-9584517C6EB4 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 13:13:41 -0400 Scientists uncover hints of a potential new cause of stomach cancer
研究揭示了B细胞如何保护高亲和力抗体疫苗产生持久的高亲和力抗体的能力取决于微妙的平衡。暴露于疫苗或病原体后，B细胞会争先恐后地完善其防御能力，并迅速突变，希望产生最有效的抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-reveals-how-b-cells-safeguard-safeguard-high-affinity-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-reveals-how-b-cells-safeguard-safeguard-high-affinity-antibient-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cca1bcc-efe8-422a-b91b-c0ba0564991f Wed, 19 Mar 2025 13:09:20 -0400 Study reveals how B cells safeguard high-affinity antibodies
研究发现解决了免疫系统如何平衡速度和精度的悖论生发中心是高速进化机。生发中心在淋巴结中的微小簇通过突变和膨胀来完善抗体，直到它们产生适应于不同病原体的高亲和力B细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/research-findings-solve-the-the-paradox-of-how-the-the-mmune-system-system-system-system-system-systalance-speed-speed-and-precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/research-findings-solve-the-paradox-the-paradox-of-how-the-mmune-system-system-system-system-system-system-salances-speed-and-precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51D14Fe3-5336-4346-4346-A1F1-5C90BC59374F Wed, 19 Mar 2025 13:04:15 -0400 Research findings solve the paradox of how the immune system balances speed and precision
长尾小鹦鹉揭示了类似人类语音模式的秘密一项新的研究解释了长尾小鹦鹉的大脑如何模仿人类的单词。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/parakeet-brain-brain-reveals-secrets-secrets-f-human-human--humanike-spech-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/parakeet-brain-brain-reveals-secrets-of-human-human--------human----------------human-like-spech-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AF19E9E9E95C-4F9F-4FCD-9DAE-E5ECE77738CCF Wed, 19 Mar 2025 12:51:12 -0400 Parakeet brain reveals secrets of human-like speech patterns
临床试验研究1型糖尿病的骨质疏松药物Hope®城市是美国最大，最先进的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，也是糖尿病和其他威胁生命的疾病的顶级研究中心，正在领导一项1/2期临床试验，研究了骨质疏松症药物，作为改善早期1型糖尿病患者的β细胞健康的一种方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/clinical-clinical-trial-investigates-sostepoporisois-medication-medication-for-type-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/clinical-clinical-trial-investigates-sopeoporisois-medication-medication-for-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eea786fc-18f0-4bc5-9b87-460370122a33 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 12:44:58 -0400 Clinical trial investigates osteoporosis medication for type 1 diabetes

研究揭示了美国耐药性弯曲杆菌感染的趋势弯曲杆菌感染是美国最常见的食源性疾病，每年估计有150万人患有150万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-reveals-trends-trends-in-drug-compystant-campylobacter-infections-infections-across-across-the-us.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/study-reveals-trends-trends-in-drug-compystant-campylobacter-infections-infections-across-across-the-us.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cad3abd-7A35-4D19-876B-A0A3BBB0A3E3E5A Wed, 19 Mar 2025 12:24:51 -0400 Study reveals trends in drug-resistant Campylobacter infections across the U.S.
